comment.body:
hi there,

it looks like this change may have broken your list in Adguard Home:

```
! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/161364
/(//|\.|^)github\.[a-z]{2,20}(/|$)/$document,match-case,~com^
@@||org^
@@||net^
@@||co^
@@||blog^
@@||community^
@@||host^
@@||io^
@@||microsoft^
@@||office^
@@||uk^
@@||us^
@@||xn--fiqs8s^
```

this is whitelisting all of the above TLDs in Adguard Home. I first noticed an issue when Google/Doubleclick ads started appearing in ads and saw this:

![agh-whitelist](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28714002/b0b91b1a-ef34-49be-ba15-1ba791448ee4)

as a more extreme example, this is causing AGH to whitelist your own entries:

![dandelion-whitelist](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/28714002/05135316-3908-4b81-a060-408cc7cdd16d)

I am running AGH in a Docker container; it's Version: v0.108.0-a.624+4e8d3d76 (edge)

I am not sure how to fix this myself, so I have removed your list from my AGH instance for now. I just wanted to let you know and I very much appreciate the dedication and effort that goes into maintaining this - thank you!

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: stwater.co.uk
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

2.1.72.49

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.stwater.co.uk/in-my-area/check-my-area/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Comment

When any of the filters listed are enabled, the page doesn't load and only returns a white screen. This is blocking a cookie screen that is needed to progress to the next screen.

* AdGuard Annoyances filter
* AdGuard – Cookie Notices

2. Screenshots

* Filters enabled - https://i.imgur.com/obNwjhA.png
* Filters disabled - https://i.imgur.com/mAZBdV3.png

### Privacy

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

2.1.72.49

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.stwater.co.uk/in-my-area/check-my-area/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Comment

When any of the filters listed are enabled, the page doesn't load and only returns a white screen. This is blocking a cookie screen that is needed to progress to the next screen.

* AdGuard Annoyances filter
* AdGuard – Cookie Notices

2. Screenshots

* Filters enabled - https://i.imgur.com/obNwjhA.png
* Filters disabled - https://i.imgur.com/mAZBdV3.png

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
`frame` is an alias for `subdocument` - https://adguard.com/kb/general/ad-filtering/create-own-filters/#subdocument-modifier, so it should works.

I have checked it out here - `https://wccftech.com/videos/smalf7qzepq/`, with rules like this:
```adblock
$frame,redirect=noopframe,domain=wccftech.com
```
and it works correctly.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/967dc38e-869d-41c9-bb87-51399fa21ba0)

</details>

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/160991#issuecomment-1717027987 - I can reproduce it (not on the first visit, but after refreshing website).
Something like this:
```adblock
www.google.*#%#//scriptlet('trusted-set-cookie', 'SOCS', 'CAESHA')
```
seems to fix it, but I guess that it might require more tests to check out if it will not break something.

Hi @manirhossen
Those Filters Were Already Patched By DGOwner
I Will Regularly Update The Filters Here - https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/19165#issuecomment-1704355990
```
@@*$script,domain=dropgalaxy.com
||cloudfront.net^$script,domain=dropgalaxy.com,important
@@||googlesyndication.com^$domain=dropgalaxy.com
@@||adoto.net^$script,xhr,domain=dropgalaxy.com
@@||doubleclick.net^$domain=dropgalaxy.com
@@||challenges.cloudflare.com^$subdocument,domain=dropgalaxy.com
*$script,redirect-rule=noopjs,domain=dropgalaxy.com
*$frame,denyallow=cloudflare.com,domain=dropgalaxy.com
*$image,redirect-rule=32x32.png:5,domain=dropgalaxy.com
*$frame,redirect=noopframe,domain=dropgalaxy.com
*$xhr,redirect-rule=noop.txt,domain=dropgalaxy.com
dropgalaxy.com#@#iframe

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Или вкючите фильтр попапов AdGuard.

issue.title: Add `lint-staged`
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

-

### Proposed solution

Currently `pre-commit` hook calls linter for the whole project, but this behaviour can cause problems if a non-staged file contains an invalid rule. At the moment of making the commit, it is enough to run the linter just on the staged files.

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: Add `lint-staged`

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

issue.body:
Currently `pre-commit` hook calls linter for the whole project, but this behaviour can cause problems if a non-staged file contains an invalid rule. At the moment of making the commit, it is enough to run the linter just on the staged files.

Reported by @piquark6046 

CC @Alex-302 @slavaleleka

comment.body: Need to resolve https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AGLint/issues/184

https://telegra.ph is owned by Telegram and can be used to quickly write formatted texts. More details at the announcement here: https://telegram.org/blog/instant-view#telegraph. issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Irrelevent

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, other (specify in comment below), the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://telegra.ph

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### About the site

https://telegra.ph is owned by Telegram and can be used to quickly write formatted texts. More details at the announcement here: https://telegram.org/blog/instant-view#telegraph. The site also has an option to report the user-generated content for illegal content, which makes it unreasonable IMO to not block this site. Users of TG might also be affected (not sure though)

### Cloudflare DNS (1.1.1.1) :white_check_mark:
```
$ dig @1.1.1.1 telegra.ph +tls

; <<>> DiG 9.18.18 <<>> @1.1.1.1 telegra.ph +tls
; (1 server found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4874
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 1232
; PAD: (409 bytes)
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;telegra.ph.			IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
telegra.ph.		23	IN	A	149.154.164.13

;; Query time: 146 msec
;; SERVER: 1.1.1.1#853(1.1.1.1) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Sat Sep 09 18:58:05 IST 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 468

```

### Google DNS (8.8.8.8) :white_check_mark: 
```
$ dig @8.8.8.8 telegra.ph +tls

; <<>> DiG 9.18.18 <<>> @8.8.8.8 telegra.ph +tls
; (1 server found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46691
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 512
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;telegra.ph.			IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
telegra.ph.		38	IN	A	149.154.164.13

;; Query time: 176 msec
;; SERVER: 8.8.8.8#853(8.8.8.8) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Sat Sep 09 18:59:13 IST 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 55

```

### Adgaurd Default (blocks ads + trackers) :white_check_mark: 
```
$ dig @94.140.14.14 telegra.ph +tls


; <<>> DiG 9.18.18 <<>> @94.140.14.14 telegra.ph +tls
; (1 server found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 25941
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;telegra.ph.			IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
telegra.ph.		141	IN	A	149.154.164.13

;; Query time: 396 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(94.140.14.14) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Sat Sep 09 19:01:42 IST 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 55


```

### Adguard non-filtering (same result as above) :white_check_mark: 

### Adguard Family ❌

```
$ dig @94.140.14.15 telegra.ph +tls

; <<>> DiG 9.18.18 <<>> @94.140.14.15 telegra.ph +tls
; (1 server found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0

;telegra.ph.			IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
telegra.ph.		3600	IN	A	94.140.14.35

;; Query time: 413 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.15#853(94.140.14.15) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Sat Sep 09 19:08:03 IST 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 55


```


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

pull_request.title: Update Instacart filter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

Instacart updated their website layout slightly, so the existing rule does not work anymore to block individual Sponsored products. This PR fixes the rule. Tested on both desktop and mobile.



## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/160129

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

pull_request.title: Update Instacart filter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

Instacart updated their website layout slightly, so the existing rule does not work anymore to block individual Sponsored products. This PR fixes the rule. Tested on both desktop and mobile.



## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/160129

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>
